alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 8:39AM CDT until April 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 26.9 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 15.5 feet by Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 26.9 Tue 8 am CDT 26.0 21.3 16.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
